Articles.Content:
Post your random forum chain games. I'll start.

Earth!!!

OdinYggd has figured out that the now deleted game is total and utter Nonsense. If you did see it, DO NOT PLAY IT! FOR THE LOVE OF ALL SAFE AND SANE, DO NOT PLAY IT! YOU WILL MOST DEFINITELY DIE! Odin, if you're reading this, buy yourself a tasty treat, or give yourself a cash sum!

Edited September 25, 2013 by Flymetothemun
OdinYggd has discerned that it is Nonsense.

If this isn't supposed to be a forum game with a documented ruleset, in which case it is in the wrong section, then it is straight up nonsense.

I think you have some explaining to do. Just what is this thread for.

If this isn't supposed to be a forum game with a documented ruleset, in which case it is in the wrong section, then it is straight up nonsense.

I think you have some explaining to do. Just what is this thread for.

Yes! You have discerned that it is total, straight-up nonsense! The post has been edited to say that it is total nonsense. A warning against playing the game has also been added.
I was intending to have users post common Internet forum chain post things like the Captain Planet thing I started.
